__e: You just took one more person's breath away.
I remember the first time I came here, and as I was leaving I looked at you, and you looked at me and, and I lost my breath for a moment.
I just got a little winded for a second.
And I-I-I gave him my breath, and--and he-- he opened his eyes, and he started crying, and...
